TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInvokeOnGetBinder

summary.span: 代表動態取得成員作業的相關資訊，這項資訊表示該取得成員是否要在屬性執行取得作業時叫用這些屬性。

span.span: Represents information about a dynamic get member operation that indicates if the get member should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeOnGet As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeOnGet { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示此取得成員作業是否應該在屬性執行取得作業時叫用這些屬性。

span.span: Gets the value indicating if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

summary.span: 當這個介面不存在時，預設值為 true。

span.span: The default value when this interface is not present is true.

value.span: 如果此取得成員作業應該在屬性執行取得作業時叫用這些屬性，則為 true，否則 false。

span.span: True if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些語言用這個屬性來取得好[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)]互通的體驗。This property is used by some languages to get a better [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] interoperation experience. 當此值設為 false，動態[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)]物件將不叫用物件，但會改為繫結名稱，並傳回可叫用，或稍後編製索引的物件。When the value is set to false, the dynamic [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] object will not invoke the object but will instead bind to the name, and return an object that can be invoked or indexed later. 這是適用於索引的屬性並不會產生 InvokeMember 呼叫站台的語言。This is useful for indexed properties and languages that do not produce InvokeMember call sites.
